message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a fair starting point.
Let's be a little more even. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  We can work towards a more balanced outcome in the next round if you prefer.
I'm willing to move closer to your proposal, but I think a 52.5/47.5 split is a more equitable compromise. This way we both get closer to what we want, and we can avoid further inflation.
